name: @rakuten-rex/react-component-starter-kit

scripts.init:component: node init.js && npm i && npm start
scripts.build: npm run build:component && npm run build:storybook
scripts.build:patch: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:minor: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:major: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run build:commit
scripts.build:commit: npm run build && npm run commit
scripts.commit: npm run commit:docs && npm run commit:package
scripts.commit:docs: git add docs README.md && git commit -m 'Added - Docs for github pages and README file'
scripts.commit:package: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m 'New version - v'$npm_package_version

author: ReX React UI Components Library Authors (https://github.com/rakuten-rex/react-component-starter-kit/graphs/contributors)
